title: 30 Days of Shitpost-Day 7: Aatrox vs Kayle in a nutshell
body:
{{champion:10}} : You remind of this guy Sebastian, yeah a bunch of people didn't like him so they started shooting arrows at him, but somehow he lived
{{champion:266}} : What happened to him afterwards?
{{champion:10}} : They beat the shit out of him anyways
{{champion:266}} : TRIGGERED
{{champion:16}} : ... Not this shit again

replies.body: I'm still hoping they will remove it. It doesn't bring much to his kit anymore, and it doesn't fit his lore/theme very well. Give him something else instead.

Personally as a pokemon player, I absolutely love death fodder, and Aatrox was the closest thing was to that until they changed it recently and now I have little desire to play him now. 

I know it sounds dumb but Aatrox gave the ADC main inside me to be able to dive in all batshit crazy
I like diving batshit crazy, but generally you just get shit on right after you revive. Unless you're with your team.

My belief with that was that Aatrox's greatest weakness is his greatest strength. Due to his weakness of bursting him down to his passive, it forces the opponent to waste cooldowns on him.  

Guess it's time to go back to Vayne anyways
i would laugh but i don't know what your referring to with "sebastian"

Saint Sebastian

Soraka is referring to Irene of Rome

(Yeah probably not that great of a shitpost, but it was Sunday and I saw the correlation)

I can recall the name of the Roman general who fought against Attila the Hun, the origin of the catapracht, and which culture actually wore horned helmets, but that historical reference is lost on me. Might want to pick something a bit better known nest time.
